headline.main: Syrian Pilot Whose Plane Crashed in Turkey Says Aircraft Was Shot Down: Anadolu Agency
headline.print_headline: Syrian Pilot Whose Plane Crashed in Turkey Says Aircraft Was Shot Down: Anadolu Agency

lead_paragraph: A Syrian pilot whose plane crashed in Turkey on Saturday said in an initial statement to Turkish authorities that his aircraft was shot down on its way to strike rural areas near Idlib, which is in northern Syria, state-run Anadolu agency reported on Sunday.
snippet: A Syrian pilot whose plane crashed in Turkey on Saturday said in an initial statement to Turkish authorities that his aircraft was shot down on its way to strike rural areas near Idlib, which is in northern Syria, state-run Anadolu agency reported...
